Footer.title: Monastery360 Digital Heritage
Footer.description: Preserving and sharing the sacred cultural heritage of Sikkim's monasteries through digital innovation, making ancient wisdom accessible to the world.

hero.title: DISCOVER
hero.subtitle: Sikkim's Sacred Monasteries
hero.description: Immerse yourself in the spiritual heritage of the Himalayas through virtual tours, digital archives, and interactive experiences that bring ancient wisdom to life.

sanctuaries.title: Sacred Sanctuaries
sanctuaries.description: Explore the most revered monasteries of Sikkim, each holding centuries of spiritual wisdom and architectural marvels nestled in the Himalayan landscape.

geography.title: Explore the Sacred Geography
geography.description: Navigate through Sikkim's spiritual landscape with our interactive map featuring monastery locations, trekking routes, and cultural points of interest.

map.title: Interactive Map
map.description: Full interactive map with monastery locations, routes, and cultural sites.

locations.title: Monastery Locations
locations.description: Discover precise locations of all major monasteries with detailed information and visiting hours.

routes.title: Pilgrimage Routes
routes.description: Follow traditional pilgrimage paths connecting monasteries with guided route information.

preservation.title: Digital Preservation
preservation.description: Access our comprehensive digital archive of Buddhist manuscripts, sacred art, and historical documents preserved for future generations.

manuscripts.title: Ancient Manuscripts
manuscripts.description: Rare Buddhist texts, philosophical treatises, and prayer books.

murals.title: Sacred Murals
murals.description: Detailed photography of monastery wall paintings and artistic decorations.

records.title: Historical Records
records.description: Administrative records, chronicles, and historical accounts of monastic life.

audioGuide.title: Smart Audio Guide
audioGuide.description: Transform your monastery visits with our intelligent audio guide app. Get contextual information, stories, and spiritual insights as you explore.

player.title: Sikkim Monasteries
player.subtitle: Audio Guide v2.1
player.trackTitle: "The Golden Stupa of Rumtek: A Sacred Symbol of Enlightenment"

location.title: Location-Based Audio
location.description: Automatic commentary triggered by your GPS location as you explore each monastery.

narration.title: Expert Narration
narration.description: Stories told by Buddhist scholars, monks, and local historians in multiple languages.

soundscapes.title: Ambient Soundscapes
soundscapes.description: Immersive audio featuring chanting, prayer bells, and natural mountain sounds.

MonasteriesPage.title: Monasteries of Sikkim
MonasteriesPage.subtitle: Discover the spiritual heart of the Himalayas. Use our interactive map to explore ancient monasteries, learn their stories, and find practical information for your visit.

CulturePage.title: Culture & Wisdom
CulturePage.subtitle: Engage with Sikkim's profound spiritual heritage through interactive digital tools. Explore ancient art and create your own symbols of peace.

ExperiencesPage.title: Curated Experiences
ExperiencesPage.subtitle: Craft your unique journey through Sikkim. Choose from spiritual retreats, cultural immersions, and adventurous treks designed for the modern pilgrim.

peace-seeker.title: Peace-Seeker Spiritual Retreat
peace-seeker.description: A 7-day immersive retreat in a functioning monastery. Participate in daily chants, meditation, and philosophy teachings.

himalayan-trek.title: Himalayan Monastery Trek
himalayan-trek.description: A guided 5-day trek connecting three remote monasteries. Includes camping, a local guide, and all meals.

culture-workshop.title: Cultural Heritage Workshop
culture-workshop.description: A weekend workshop on Thangka painting and Buddhist calligraphy, taught by local masters in Gangtok.

peaceSeeker.title: The Peace-Seeker Program
peaceSeeker.description: For those seeking profound spiritual immersion, our Peace-Seeker Program offers the unique opportunity to experience monastic life. Participate in daily rituals, learn ancient philosophies, and find your inner calm under the guidance of seasoned monks.
features: Live like a monk or nun within a monastery.

teamUp.title: Traveler Team-Up Hub
teamUp.description: Connect with fellow travelers exploring Sikkim. Share experiences, join group tours, or simply make new friends on your spiritual journey.

MarketplacePage.title: Monastery Marketplace
MarketplacePage.subtitle: Support local monastic communities by purchasing authentic, handcrafted goods. Every purchase contributes to their self-sustainment and cultural preservation.

TravelPage.title: Travel & Booking
TravelPage.subtitle: Your seamless journey to serenity starts here. Book tickets, find transport, and get all the assistance you need for a worry-free pilgrimage.

bus.title: Local Buses & Taxis
bus.description: Sikkim Nationalised Transport (SNT) offers regular bus services connecting major towns and monasteries. Shared and private taxis are also widely available for more flexible travel. We recommend booking taxis a day in advance, especially during peak season.

rental.title: Rental Vehicles
rental.description: For ultimate freedom, consider renting a vehicle with a local driver. This allows you to explore off-the-beaten-path destinations at your own pace. Our partners offer reliable vehicles and experienced drivers familiar with mountain roads.

helpline.title: Traveler Helpline
helpline.description: Need assistance during your travels? Our support team is here to help with any critical issues you may face.

offline.title: Offline Helpline
offline.description: For urgent matters, call one of our support numbers:

online.title: Online Support
online.description: For non-urgent inquiries or to get in touch via email, please use our contact form. We typically respond within 24 hours.
